html:
{%- for row in doc.packages_in_warehouse_receipt -%}
QUICKBOX NICARAGUA
operations@quickboxni.com
www.quickboxni.com
8534 NW 70TH ST
Miami, Florida, 33166-2652
Phone: +1 (786) 303-2784

{{ doc.shipper }}

{{ row.consignee or doc.consignee }}

{{ row.receipt_date or doc.opening_date }}

{{ doc.transportation_type|upper }}

{{ loop.index }} of {{ loop.length }}

{{ row.type }}

{{ row.weight }} lb

{{ doc.total_weight }} lb

{{ row.get_formatted("length", doc) }} x {{ row.get_formatted("width", doc) }} x {{ row.get_formatted("height", doc) }}

{{ row.get_formatted("description", doc) }}

{% if row.tracking_number %} {% endif %}
{%- endfor -%}
name: Warehouse Receipt Labels
